name: Dal Stuffed Poori
Description: Dal Stuffed Poori is a traditional Indian deep-fried bread made with whole wheat flour and a flavorful lentil filling.A very tasty dish

name: Dry Fruits Cake
Description: Dry Fruits Cake is a rich and wholesome dessert made with a delightful mix of dried fruits and nuts, blended into a soft, moist cake.

name: Luchi Aaloo Dum
Description: Luchi Aaloo Dum is a classic Bengali delicacy that pairs soft, golden, deep-fried flatbreads (luchi) with a spicy, flavorful potato curry (aaloo dum).
